24.1.hd_quote: Transformation that requires retrogressive periods before renewal can take place.
24.1.behavioral_axis: Cycles back to test whether an inspiration is new and worth knowing.
24.1.shadow_axis: Loops on the past; stalls creative mutation.

24.2.hd_quote: The proper and spontaneous adaptation to new forms.
24.2.behavioral_axis: Shares fresh concepts quickly, without checking provenance.
24.2.shadow_axis: Projects originality; risks public correction for unoriginal ideas.

24.3.hd_quote: The powerful attraction of regressive forms.
24.3.behavioral_axis: Hooks into inspiration then drops it; tests knowability irresponsibly.

24.4.hd_quote: Transformation that can only take place in isolation.
24.4.behavioral_axis: Protects originality by withdrawing to process alone.
24.4.shadow_axis: Isolation drifts into fantasy; resists helpful input.

24.5.hd_quote: The courage to admit the mistakes of the past.
24.5.behavioral_axis: Admits prior error to unlock the next mutation.
24.5.shadow_axis: Justifies the past; turns confession into self-defense.

24.6.hd_quote: The possibility of being deaf when opportunity knocks.
24.6.behavioral_axis: Ignores options until one truly mutative path appears.
24.6.shadow_axis: Paralysis by suspicion; overlooks workable opportunities.
